text: Two thieves were fighting over a stolen tool. While it was raining fists, a third Thief comes and takes the Borriquillo. The Jumento is usually some miserable province; the Thieves, this or that Prince, like that of Transylvania, that of Hungary or the Ottoman. Instead of two, I've come up with three: enough already. For none of them is the conquered province: a fourth comes, leaving them all equal, taking the Borriquillo. The following information is provided: Donkey: donkey, donkey.
title: Los Ladrones y el Jumento
author: Jean de La Fontaine
